CardsRaffle.awardRafflePrize (/unique_chucks/29/0x4cb200957a11cbff512b4752e6ee38c9253fdd54.sol#211-253) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

	- require(bool)(raffleEndTime < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/29/0x4cb200957a11cbff512b4752e6ee38c9253fdd54.sol#213-214)
	- raffleTicketThatWon >= checkTicket.startId && raffleTicketThatWon <= checkTicket.endId (/unique_chucks/29/0x4cb200957a11cbff512b4752e6ee38c9253fdd54.sol#229-231)
